tag: html body text title span span
content: Webelos Ceremonies - Cub Leader's Meeting Dazzlers

tag: html body text center font strong span
html body text center p font a strong span
html body text center p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font p span
content: The Webelos den is unique in several respects.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td font p span
content: First, it includes all the fourth- and fifth-grade boys in the pack. Second, Webelos Scouts wear uniforms that are different from those of younger Cub Scouts. Third, Webelos Scouts do not work on achievements and electives; they have their own activity badge areas to master. Fourth, their goals are the Webelos badge and Arrow of Light Award, which signify that they are ready to become Boy Scouts when they reach the age of 11

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td font p i span
content: (or are 10-1/2 and have completed fifth grade)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td font p span
html body text center table tbody tr td font p span
content: There are other differences, too, but these four offer the best opportunities for ceremonies that recognize the unique status of the Webelos Scout.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Every Webelos ceremony should help the Webelos Scout anticipate the fun and adventure he will have as a Boy Scout. The rank should bring to the Webelos Scout and his parents a feeling of preparation for Scouting.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
content: Den Chief in Native American regalia.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span

html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span

html body text center table tbody tr td font span
content: Great for large Dens with active Scouts!

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td font span
html body text center table tbody tr td a font strong span

content: Search the Net for Webelos Ceremonies

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos den leader; Webelos den chief, the transferring Cub Scout, his den leader and his parents; members of Webelos den to hold flags.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The pack flag; the transferring Cub Scout's den flag; the Webelos den flag; the Webelos cap; neckerchief

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Tonight we welcome Bear Cub Scout [name] into our Webelos den. He has completed the third grade and has shown himself worthy by working hard through the Wolf and Bear Cub Scout ranks. Before we call Cub Scout [name] and his parents forward, I will ask that the pack flag and his former den flag and the flag of his Webelos den be brought to the center of the stage.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Members of the Webelos den present the flags.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now, will Bear Cub Scout [name] come forward with his parents and den leader.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Den leader's name], will you please present Bear Cub Scout [name] with his new Webelos neckerchief

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Name], we welcome you into our Webelos den. You're sure to have fun with us because we do lots of exciting things, like hikes and overnight campouts.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Wear your Webelos neckerchief proudly. It means you've taken another step along the Scouting trail.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: And now, Bear Cub Scout [name], we want to give you the other part of the Webelos uniform, the Webelos cap. It will tell everybody that you are an older boy, getting ready for the adventures of Boy Scouting. The Webelos cap will hold the activity badges you earn as you explore the Webelos trail. Welcome to our Webelos den. Now I believe your former den leader wants to say a few words.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Name], we have enjoyed having you with us in Den [number]. I'm sure you'll do as well in the Webelos den as you have in ours. Your former den mates wish you good luck as you move farther along the Scouting trail.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (He or she salutes or shakes hands with him.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [New Webelos Scouts parents], you have helped [name] this far along the Cub Scout trail. It is important now that you continue to stay with him and become thoroughly familiar with the Scouting trail in our Webelos den. We will soon have the pleasure, we know, of seeing you present your son with activity badges, the Webelos badge, and finally, the Arrow of Light Award, the highest award in Cub Scouting.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The pack gives its yell and the group retires to their seats.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Cubmaster and Bear Cub Scout, seven Webelos Scouts; Webelos den leader.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Large cards, each printed with a letter of W-E-B-E-L-O-S.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos Scouts, holding their letters, form a semicircle with their backs toward the audience. The Cubmaster and the Webelos den leader

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: stand. The Cubmaster invites the Bear Cub Scout who is entering the Webelos den to come forward; he introduces him to each Webelos Scout and the Webelos den leader, and each gives him the Cub Scout handshake. One by one, each boy in the semicircle turns to face the audience, holds his letter shoulder-high, and recites his line.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Each Scout earns his own activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Boys are in the fourth and fifth grades.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Every Scout can earn the Webelos badge and Arrow of Light Award.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Love of God and country we will show.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: On our honor, we will do our best.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Scouts are friendly and helpful, at home, at school, and in the community.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (In succession, the boys repeat their letters.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Cubmaster; Webelos den leader; Webelos den chief; the transferring Cub Scout, his den leader, and his parents; member of Webelos den to hold the pack flag.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Pack flag, the transferring Cub Scout's den flag, Webelos den flag, Webelos neckerchief and slide, a copy of the Webelos Scout Book.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Tonight we have a Bear Cub Scout who is transferring to the Webelos den. Before we call this boy and his parents forward, I will ask that our pack flag be brought to the center of the stage, and that Webelos Den Leader [name] and Webelos Den Chief [name] come forward with the Webelos den flag.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (When they are in position Cubmaster continues.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now will Bear Cub Scout [name] come forward with his parents and den leader and stand at the left of our pack flag?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (If he is new to Cub Scouting, adapt accordingly.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Den Leader [name], will you please explain the purpose of the Webelos den?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Our Webelos den has one big purpose. That's to prepare our Webelos Scouts for Boy Scouting. We work on exciting activity badge areas, learning things that may lead us to lifelong hobbies or vocations. At the same time, we study the Boy Scout requirements so the boys will be ready to become Boy Scouts when they are eligible.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Our Webelos den meets at my home

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (gives address, time, and day of the week.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: We participate in all regular pack activities, work on selected activity badges, and work toward finishing the requirements for the Webelos badge and Arrow of Light Award. We also visit Boy Scout troops in our neighborhood to help our boys decide which troop they wish to join.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: We have made a promise to our boys to help them know the great outdoors and to go on hikes and overnight camping trips every year with their adult partners. This Webelos den activity starts the Webelos Scouts along the outdoor Scouting trail.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I will call on our Webelos den chief to present the Webelos neckerchief.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Webelos den chief steps forward with Webelos den flag, which he hands to the Webelos den leader to hold.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Boy's name], we welcome you into our Webelos den. We have fun as we practice, and learn the activity badges and Boy Scout requirements. As we work and play together, a lot will be expected of you. I am happy to present to you your Webelos neckerchief. Here is your Webelos Scout Book. Its pages will lead you into many hours of pleasure and knowledge. May it be your constant companion. Welcome to our Webelos den.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Adapt the following to suit if the boy is new to Cub Scouting.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Name], your former den leader, extends the best wishes of your old den.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Boy's name], Den [number] has been glad to have you as a member. We have had much fun together. Now, your former den mates wish you much happiness and success in your new den.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (He or she salutes or shakes hands with him.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: [Cub Scout's parents' names] have helped [boy's name] along the Cub Scout trail this far. It is important now that you continue to stay with him and become thoroughly familiar with the Scouting trail in our Webelos den. We will soon have the pleasure, we know, of seeing you present your son with the Arrow of Light Award.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The pack gives yell and the group retires.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Pack advancement chairman or Webelos den leader, Indian scout

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: , Bear Cub Scouts, Indian drummer, Webelos den members.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Indian drum; artificial campfire; peace pipe; Indian costumes; Webelos neckerchiefs, slides, and caps; copies of Webelos Scout Book.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos den members in Indian costumes sit on the floor in a circle around the artificial campfire. The Indian chief stands in a prominent position and the Indian drummer stands to one side or sits in the circle. The Indian scout stands in front of the circle.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (As the drum is sounded with a soft "boom, boom:" he comes to the center of the room.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Scouts of the Webelos tribe, we have [number] boys who wish to enter the Webelos circle.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I have Bear Cub Scouts [names] of Den [number].

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Boom of the drum is heard as the boys advance toward him.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The boys do so. The drum booms again as the Indian scout escorts the boys to the Indian chief. They stand on his right.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Do I hear the South Wind?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I am the South Wind. I wish you good Scouting. Over hill and dale I have carried stories of you and your Cub Scout experiences. As Cub Scouts you have been happy, game, and fair, and a credit to your den and pack.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Do I hear the East Wind?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I am the East Wind. I wish you well. I have spread the story of your fun and happiness as Bobcats, Wolves, and Bears in Cub Scouting with Pack [number], and how you lived up to the Cub Scout promise.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Do I hear the West Wind?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I am the West Wind. I would like everyone to know that these Cub Scouts going into the Webelos den did not walk the trail of Cub Scouting alone. Each had the wonderful help of his parents. Please continue to help your Cub Scouts go, and also to grow.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: What are all the winds saying?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: We will be with you forever. We wish you the best of luck in the Webelos den.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The purpose of the Webelos den is to help our boys earn the Webelos badge and Cub Scouting's highest award, the Arrow of Light Award, and to help them become Boy Scouts when they are eligible.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Our Webelos den meets at [location] on [give day of the week and time], and we have meetings and trips on Saturdays. We will also have activities with Boy Scout troops. As you notice in the Webelos Scout Book, we work on Webelos activity badges. I will be calling upon each of you parents to assist me with one of the activity badge areas. Now I would like to award Cub Scout [name] his Webelos neckerchief and slide, his Webelos Scout Book, and Webelos cap.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Cubmaster, Webelos leader, Bear Cub Scouts.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Indian headbands; Webelos neckerchiefs, slides, and caps; council fire; bridge; copies of Webelos Scout Book.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Bear Cub Scouts are sitting at the council fire.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Bears, you have in the past worked on the Wolf trail and your most recent adventures have been on the Bear trail. You have proven yourselves to be good Scouts. You have now earned the honor of joining our Webelos council fire.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The Bears are called up and cross over the bridge. They are given a Webelos neckerchief, neckerchief slide, book, and Webelos cap.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Congratulations, young braves. You will find lots of fun and adventures ahead of you.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scouts may earn a variety of activity badges during their year in the den. These activity badges are: Aquanaut, Artist, Athlete, Citizen, Communicator, Craftsman, Engineer, Family Member, Fitness, Forester, Geologist, Handyman, Naturalist, Outdoorsman, Readyman, Scholar, Scientist, Showman, Sportsman, Traveler.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos den leader will be focusing on one of these areas each month, so it may happen that you will have several boys who have earned the same activity badge. If so, this is an opportunity for a ceremony involving an outside expert in the subject. Take this opportunity, if possible, because it will lead to variety in your ceremonies.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: While there is no national recognition of the boy who qualifies for all activity badges, many local packs recognize the Webelos Scout in a special way when he earns all of the activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Here is an example of a ceremony you might develop for awarding a single activity badge to several Webelos Scouts, and one for use when you have several different activity badges to present.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos den leader, an engineer, Webelos Scouts who have earned the badge, parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The drawings, sketches, blocks and tackles, catapults, etc., made by the Webelos Scouts; Engineer activity badges; safety pins.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: For the past 2 months our den has been working at home and in our meetings on the Engineer activity badge. I'm happy to say that [number] of the boys have passed the requirements and earned this badge. Will Webelos Scouts [names] and their parents please come forward.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: With us tonight is [name], an engineer with [name of company], who will present the badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Boys, I have looked over the requirements for the Engineer activity badge in your Webelos Scout Book, and I must say that you have done fine work in meeting them. Your work on this badge will be a good basis to start from if any of you decide to become engineers. Now, Pd like to see how the things you made work.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The Webelos Scouts show catapults, blocks and tackles, drawings, and sketches for all to see.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: That's excellent! I'm proud to see that you have learned engineering principles so well.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I now take pleasure in presenting these Engineer activity badges to your parents, who will fasten them onto your Webelos cap.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scouts may earn a variety of activity badges during their year in the den. These activity badges are: Aquanaut, Artist, Athlete, Citizen, Communicator, Craftsman, Engineer, Family Member, Fitness, Forester, Geologist, Handyman, Naturalist, Outdoorsman, Readyman, Scholar, Scientist, Showman, Sportsman, Traveler.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos den leader will be focusing on one of these areas each month, so it may happen that you will have several boys who have earned the same activity badge. If so, this is an opportunity for a ceremony involving an outside expert in the subject. Take this opportunity, if possible, because it will lead to variety in your ceremonies.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: While there is no national recognition of the boy who qualifies for all activity badges, many local packs recognize the Webelos Scout in a special way when he earns all of the activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Here is an example of a ceremony you might develop for awarding a single activity badge to several Webelos Scouts, and one for use when you have several different activity badges to present.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos den leader, an artist, Webelos Scouts who have earned the badge, parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Blackboard or easel and paper, chalk or pencil, Artist activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Boys, I have looked over your work carefully, and I find it very good indeed. You have shown real skill in meeting the requirements for the Artist activity badge. It is a great pleasure for me to give these badges to your parents, who will fasten them on your Webelos cap.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (After the parents have taken the badges, the artist returns to the blackboard or easel.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now, if you don't mind, I'll get back to my doodling. I'm curious to find out what it is myself.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: We are very proud of our Webelos Scouts, and we hope that more members of our den will earn this badge by next month. Meanwhile, these boys and other members of the den will be starting work on another of our exciting activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (As he speaks, the artist completes a drawing of the Arrow of Light. The den leader continues to talk about the work of the Webelos den until the artist finishes the sketch.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Were you a Cub Scout, [name of artist]?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: No, the idea just came to me in a flash - with a little help from the badge that Webelos Scout over there is wearing.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Well, it's a wonderful ideal because the Arrow of Light is the badge that every member of our den is striving for. The Arrow of Light means that a Webelos Scout is really ready for the big step into the high adventure of Boy Scouting. And now, [name of artist], I'd like to thank you for coming tonight, and I hope you will stay after the meeting to talk with our Webelos Scouts and their parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos den leader, den chief, Webelos Scouts who have earned activity badges, parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Arrow of Light ceremonial board with one small candle for each activity badge to be presented plus one large candle, and the activity badges.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Four members of our Webelos den have earned activity badges this month. They are: [name], who has earned the Craftsman badge; [name], the Geologist badge; and [name] and [name], both of whom earned the Showman badge. Will these Webelos Scouts please come forward with their parents?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now, then, I will ask Den Chief [name] to light one of the small candles for each activity badge. Webelos Scout [name], you have earned the Craftsman badge. To do that, you mastered many tools and made several toys and useful items. I congratulate you on your new skills.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Hands the badge to the parents as the den chief lights the first candle.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scout [name], you have earned the Geologist badge. You had to learn a great deal about the earth and its composition, and you learned how rocks and minerals are useful to us. My congratulations to you.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Hands the badge to the parents as the den chief lights the second candle.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scouts [name] and [name], both of you have earned the Showman badge, proving your ability in entertainment. [Name] earned the badge for his fine work with puppets, and [name] for his talent and knowledge of music. I congratulate you both.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Hands the badges to the parents while the den chief lights the third candle.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now, Den Chief [name], shall we light the big candle?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Because the big candle stands for the Arrow of Light Award.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: That's right, [name]. This big candle is for the Arrow of Light Award, the highest in Cub Scouting. It must remain unlit until we have a Webelos Scout who has completed the Arrow of Light requirements. Then we will light that candle. These small candles, representing the activity badge areas, are simply steps in the development of Webelos Scouts. They are important in themselves, but they lead us to the biggest prize that a Cub Scout can earn, the Arrow of Light Award.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Now, Den Chief [name], will you lead the Webelos Scouts in your den yell?

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Cubmaster, Webelos leader, Webelos Scouts, and their parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Cubmaster: When our boys become Cub Scouts, they work to earn four badges to form a diamond on their left pocket. First they must earn their Bobcat badge. Next, they earn the Wolf badge and then they go on to achieve the Bear badge.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The final part of the Cub Scout diamond is earned as they move up the Scouting trail into the Webelos den. Our Webelos leader will tell us what is required to earn this badge.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos badge is earned by having an adult family member read and sign the Parent Guide in his Webelos Scout Book, by being active in the den for 3 months, by explaining the meaning of the Webelos badge, by explaining the parts of the Webelos uniform, by earning Fitness and two other activity badges, by planning and leading a flag ceremony in his den, by understanding the requirements for becoming a Boy Scout, and by becoming actively involved in his own religious faith. He must also understand and agree to follow the Outdoor Code.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: This step on the Scouting trail prepares our boys to earn the highest Cub Scout award, the Arrow of Light, and move on. to a Boy Scout troop.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Tonight, Webelos Scout [name] has earned this final section of the diamond.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Will Webelos Scout [name] and his parents please come forward.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scout [name], you have completed the activity badges

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: , and demonstrated that you understand the Scout Oath, Law, motto, and slogan. You have also learned the Scout sign and handshake along with the Scout salute, and completed the other requirements of this badge.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I am very pleased to present this Webelos badge to your parents to pin on your uniform.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (Repeat this for each Webelos Scout who receives the badge.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: We are very proud of the Webelos Scouts who have received the Webelos badge tonight. The final step as a Cub Scout before graduating to a Boy Scout troop will be to earn the Arrow of Light Award. I look forward to presenting this to you in the future.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font span
content: Author: Staging Den and Pack Ceremonies (BSA 33212)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos Scouts, Webelos den leader, Cubmaster, parents.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Webelos badges, ceremonial board if desired, table, safety pins.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The Webelos leader and Webelos Scouts present themselves at the front of the pack meeting. The Webelos badges are placed on the ceremonial board or table, ready for presentation by the Cubmaster. The parents remain seated until the appropriate moment near the end of the ceremony.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Will [names of participating Webelos Scouts] please give the Scout sign, and repeat the correct phrase of the Scout Oath.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: An assurance I make, a pledge to do right, I keep it before me, a bright shining light

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I'll try my best to do it, though difficult it may be, and if I keep my promise, then folks will believe in me.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: To do my duty to God and my country ...

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: To God, the creator, and a country so mighty; my reverence, my loyalty, forever I guarantee.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: And to obey the Scout Law ...

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The 12 points of the Scout Law are the rules of the game; to become a useful citizen, that is my aim.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: To help other people at all times ...

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: The young, the old, many people need me; a cheery smile, a helping hand, of service I will be.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: Building endurance, building strength, being careful, my body will serve me well if I am thoughtful.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: My mind is important, a tool to keep keen; to be always alert and ready to learn.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td p font span
content: I'll strive to be honest, clean, and faithful, my character unblemished. All good and true values I want a part of me when I've finished.

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font i span
content: (The Cubmaster calls the parents forward. With congratulations and a Cub Scout handshake, the Webelos badges are presented to the parents, who in turn present them to their boys.)

tag: html body text center table tbody tr td p font a strong span
html body text center table tbody tr td center font strong span
